name: Eat or Die! (itch) (ChromoBacterium)
description:
This is a survival game that has been made for the Fifth Brackeys Game Jam.

You are a blob that has to survive as long as possible by eating other blobs. The bigger the blobs, the more you grow (until a certain limit). If you don't eat, you will shrink and eventually fade out of existence.

Controls

WASD: Movement
